metadata.title: Seek the Fading Map
metadata.description: The ancient map etched into a stone wall in The Shattered Realms tavern holds secrets to shadowed realms and lost treasures. Only those who can interpret its language will find true guidance.

objectives.description: Interpret the ancient map's symbols and decipher its hidden paths to shadowed realms.

Learned about The Shattered Realms

details.name: The Shattered Realms
details.details: A grim and eerie tavern nestled in the ruins of an ancient kingdom. Overgrown with shadowed realms and haunted by dark sorcery, it serves as a gathering place for those who seek to unravel the mysteries of forgotten kingdoms and heed a grim prophecy.

events.description: New Quest: Seek the Fading Map

metadata.title: Seek the Prophecy Pool's Secrets
metadata.description: The pool of dark water in The Shattered Realms tavern holds visions of a grim future that must be altered. Seek to understand what these visions mean and how they can guide your path.

objectives.description: Peer into the depths of the Prophecy Pool and decipher the visions it shows, seeking guidance for your journey through shadowed realms.
